src_original: dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā dhātoḥ iti vartata eva ?
śami-sañjñāyām iti siddhe dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kṛño hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham /
śaṅkarā nāma parivrājikā /  śaṅkarā nāma śakunikā /  tacchīlā ca //
tgt_original: བདེ་བར་བྱེད་དོ་ཞེས་ཤངཀ་ར༔། ཤམབྷ་བ༔། བདེ་སྤྱོད་ཅེས་། ཤམ་བ་ད༔། བདེ་མཆོག་ཅེས་། ཤམ་བ་ར༔། འདིས་ཨཨཙའོ་༎

src_original: adhikaraṇe śeteḥ // PS_3,2.15 //  _____START JKv_3,2.15:  supi iti sambadhyate /  śeter dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
carer dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ṭapratyayo bhavati /  kuruṣu carati kurucaraḥ /  madracaraḥ /
amanuṣyakartṛke ca // PS_3,2.53 //  _____START JKv_3,2.53:  amanuṣyakartṛke vartamānād hanteḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
śaktau gamyamānāyāṃ hasti kapāṭayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
manuṣyakartṛka-artha ārambhaḥ /  hastinaṃ hantuṃ śaktaḥ hastighnaḥ manuṣyaḥ /
kaṃ pāṭayati praviśata iti kapāṭaghnaścauraḥ /  śaktau iti kim ?
viṣeṇa hastinaṃ hanti hastighātaḥ //  pāṇigha-tāḍaghau śilpini // PS_3,2.55 //

gatyartha-karmaṇi dvitīyā-caturthyau ceṣṭāyām anadhvani // PS_2,3.12 //  _____START JKv_2,3.12:  gatyarthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ceṣtākriyāṇāṃ parispandakriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake 'dhvavarjite dvitīyā-caturthyau bhavataḥ /
grāmaṃ gacchati,  grāmāya gacchati /  grāmaṃ vrajati,  grāmāya vrajati /
